name: Beat Run! Pop Music Rush
description:
A relax music game which you control a cute monster to hit beats in music!

GAME FEATURES:
- Top Hit J-POP Music
- Easy control with one finger
- Relaxing and immersive music experience
- Cute monster as character

SIMPLE PLAY
- Hold and drag to control your character
- Hit the beats and dodge the obstacles
- Try new songs and get high scores

Free New Songs! Check the game!


Beat Run is a music game from Jingmao Tec. Contact us by App Store or email below. We're looking forward to your game feedback to improve our game!
